subject: Basketball
Halls of Fame
lead_paragraph: Dennis Rodman has been voted into the Basketball Hall of Fame. Rodman says he was told Thursday to be in Houston for Monday’s announcement before the championship game of the N.C.A.A. tournament.
snippet: Dennis Rodman has been voted into the Basketball Hall of Fame. Rodman says he was told Thursday to be in Houston for Monday’s announcement before the championship game of the N.C.A.A. tournament.
